arcade.env.comp

Class TriGraphSites

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.env.comp.Sites
      • arcade.env.comp.GraphSites
        • arcade.env.comp.TriGraphSites
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TriGraphSites.Complex, TriGraphSites.Simple

    public abstract class TriGraphSites
extends GraphSites
    Extension of GraphSites for triangular lattice.

    For pattern layout, the graph is given by: 

                             ___ ___
                       /         \
                      /           \
             ___ ___ /             \ ___ ___
           /         \             /         \
          /           \           /           \
 ___ ___ /             \ ___ ___ /             \ ___ ___
         \             /         \             /
          \           /           \           /
           \ ___ ___ /             \ ___ ___ /
                     \             /
                      \           /
                       \ ___ ___ /

    For root layouts, each node has six possible orientations for the edge: left, right, up left, up right, down left, and down right. When initializing roots from a border, only certain orientations are possible:

    • left border = right, up right, down right
    • right border = left, up left, down left
    • top border = down right, down left
    • bottom border = up right, up left
    Since:
    2.3
    Version:
    2.3.35
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public java.lang.String toJSON()
        Description copied from class: GraphSites
        Represents object as a JSON entry.

        The JSON is formatted as: 

             {
         "type": "SITE",
         "class": "graph",
         "specs" : {
             "SPEC_NAME": spec value,
             "SPEC_NAME": spec value,
             ...
         }
     }
